issue.title: newslab.ru
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.49.3rc16

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

`http://newslab.ru/news/1216894`

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
Social icons are being hidden because of AdGuard Tracking Protection for some reason.
`newslab.ru##.sharing`
Would be best to keep filters like this in AdGuard Social Media. (And all cosmetic filters besides blocked site visitor counter placeholders)

These filters seem to also be unrelated to Tracking Protection:
`newslab.ru##.r-recommend`
`businessinsider.co.uk,businessinsider.com##.rail-recommended`
`life.ru##.read-next`
`radioprofusion.com##.revolvermaps`
`washingtonpost.com##.social-tools-wrapper-bottom`
`espreso.tv##.wrap-footer .counter`

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: gae2-spclient.spotify.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://open.spotify.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

filter `||gae2-spclient.spotify.com^`
in **_SpywareFilter/sections/tracking_servers_firstparty.txt_**

...is breaking spotify player. Adding exception will restore functionality, however, whether it's function as tracker or not is not known. Need clarification for the filter.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: www.asurascans.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.asurascans.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.asurascans.com%2F) ### Comment > With all the filters enabled, the page still shows me Google ads, and this happens in other pages as well. I’ve even tried to fix the issue by deleting all the cookies and clearing the cache, but it didn’t work. Any help is appreciated. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/9u0foZb.jpg)

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.asurascans.com/boundless-necromancer-chapter-32/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.asurascans.com%2Fboundless-necromancer-chapter-32%2F) ### Comment Username: @D4niloMR > Empty space left by ads, also on suryascans.com. > > Fix: > > asurascans.com##.ai-viewport-1 > .code-block.code-block-17:has(ins) ### Screenshots
